author: Staff Reporter
text:
It’s time for The Hindu Health, Fitness and Lifestyle Expo.

The two-day expo at the Chennai Trade Centre, on January 23 and 24, will showcase products and services related to health and fitness.

The offering of health insurance and general insurance products is one of the highlights of the exhibition.

On both days, the expo will be open from 10.30 a.m. to 8 p.m. The Presenting Sponsor for the expo is Global Health City. Associate Sponsors are Catch E and Amma Salt. Health Insurance partner is Royal Sundaram General insurance Co Limited. The General Insurance Partner for the event is United India Insurance Co Limited.
title: Health expo from today
